text: is a Japanese Shinto shrine in Ōita, Ōita on the island of Kyushu.Kotodamaya.com, "Sasamuta Jinja"; retrieved 2012-10-25. ==History== Sasamuta was the chief Shinto shrine (ichinomiya) of the old Bungo Province. It serves today as one of the ichinomiya of Oita Prefecture. "Nationwide List of Ichinomiya," p. 3 ; retrieved 2012-10-25. This place is special to the kami named ==References== ==Other websites == Category:Kokuhei Chūsha Category:Shinto shrines in Ōita Prefecture
title: Sasamuta-jinja
